hero.text: The most advanced solution to manage your private {game} server. Developed with the latest technologies and modern architecture from {framework}.

monitoring.subtitle: Enterprise-Class Professional Integrations

datadog.title: Datadog
datadog.description: Complete infrastructure, application and log monitoring. Custom dashboards, intelligent alerts and real-time performance analysis.

newrelic.title: New Relic
newrelic.description: Advanced APM (Application Performance Monitoring) with distributed tracing, business metrics and deep application performance analysis.

features.title: Power Your Server
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your server professionally and efficiently

performance.title: Optimal Performance
performance.description: Optimized architecture to handle thousands of simultaneous users without performance issues. Intelligent caching and optimized queries.

security.title: Advanced Security
security.description: Robust authentication system with JWT, data encryption and attack protection. Compliance with security standards.

dashboard.title: Intuitive Dashboard
dashboard.description: Modern and easy-to-use control panel to manage all aspects of your server. Real-time metrics and interactive visualizations.

integration.title: Complete Integration
integration.description: Perfectly connects with TrinityCore and other WoW server systems. RESTful API for custom integrations.

api.title: RESTful API
api.description: Complete and documented API for custom integrations and automations. Webhooks and real-time events.

database.title: Optimized Database
database.description: Efficient data management with support for MySQL/MariaDB. Optimized queries, smart indexes and automatic backups.

tech.title: Technology Stack
tech.subtitle: Built with the best tools and frameworks in the market

pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs

docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Complete guide to using SkollForge CMS

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: SkollForge CMS is a complete management system for projects related to World of Warcraft and other MMORPGs. It provides all the tools you need to manage your project efficiently and professionally.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.content: Once you subscribe to one of our plans, you'll receive full access to the CMS. The system includes managed hosting and a domain, so you don't need to configure anything on your own.
steps: Access the Client Portal with your credentials
You'll receive a domain included with your plan
Set up payment and donation systems

features.title: Main Features
features.content: The CMS includes multiple modules and features designed to provide you with a complete and professional experience:
items: Authentication and user management system: Complete control over user access and permissions with advanced security
Complete administration panel: Intuitive and powerful interface to manage all aspects of your project from a single place
Payment gateway integration (Stripe and PayU): Process payments and donations securely and automatically with leading payment platforms

Transactional email system: Security system that sends validation emails to ensure only real users can register. Advanced filter that prevents bots and protects against fraudulent registrations through email verification
Advanced monitoring and alerts: Our team is constantly monitoring your system, detecting errors and solving them proactively to ensure maximum performance
VIP System: VIP membership system that allows your project to be self-sustaining. Users can acquire exclusive benefits while you generate recurring revenue to maintain and improve your server
DDOS protection and firewall: Enterprise-level security to protect your project against threats and attacks

api.title: REST API
api.content: SkollForge CMS includes a complete REST API that allows you to integrate the system with external applications, Discord bots, or any other tool you need.

support.title: Support
support.content: We offer support via ticket and Discord. Response time depends on your plan:

contact.title: Need Help?
contact.content: If you have questions or need assistance, you can contact us through our support system or Discord. We're here to help you get the most out of SkollForge CMS.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using SkollForge CMS, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: SkollForge CMS is a content management system developed with Spring Boot for projects related to World of Warcraft and other MMORPGs. We provide managed hosting, management tools, monitoring and technical support.

usage.title: 3. Use of Service
items: Use the service only for lawful purposes
Not perform activities that may damage or interfere with the service
Maintain the confidentiality of your access credentials
Not share your account with third parties without authorization
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

payments.title: 4. Payments and Billing
payments.content: Payments are made monthly according to the selected plan. All prices are expressed in US dollars (USD) and may be subject to change with prior notice. Payment is processed automatically each month until you cancel your subscription.

cancellation.title: 5. Cancellation and Refunds
cancellation.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time. No refunds are made for already billed periods. When canceling, your service will remain active until the end of the current billing period.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: SkollForge CMS is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We will not be liable for indirect, incidental or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our service.

intellectual.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, code and materials of SkollForge CMS are the property of their respective owners and are protected by intellectual property laws. Copying, modification or distribution without prior authorization is not permitted.

modifications.title: 8. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after publication. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about these terms and conditions, you can contact us through our support system or Discord.

information.title: 1. Information We Collect
information.intro: We collect the following types of information:
items: Account information: Name, email address, billing information
Usage information: Data about how you use our service, access logs, performance metrics
Technical information: IP address, browser type, operating system, device information
Payment data: Information processed by our payment providers (Stripe, PayU, Bold)

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: Provide and maintain our service
Process payments and manage subscriptions
Send important notifications about the service
Improve and optimize our service
Detect and prevent fraud or abuse
Comply with legal obligations

sharing.title: 3. Sharing Information
sharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with third parties in the following situations:
items: Service providers: Hosting services, payment processing, analytics and monitoring (Datadog, New Relic)
Legal requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
With your consent: In any other situation with your explicit authorization

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security of your data.

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless the law requires or permits a longer retention period.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
items: Access your personal information
Correct inaccurate information
Request deletion of your data
Object to processing of your data
Request portability of your data
Withdraw your consent at any time

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience. For more information, see our Cookie Policy.

changes.title: 8. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "last updated" date.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, you can contact us through our support system or Discord.

what.title: 1. What are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide, protect and improve our services, personalize content and offer a better user experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the basic functioning of the website. They include session, authentication and security cookies. They cannot be disabled in our systems.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting information anonymously. We use services like Datadog and New Relic to monitor performance.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.content: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your preferred language) and provide enhanced and more personal features.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: We use analytics cookies to understand how users use our website. This information helps us continuously improve our service.

thirdParty.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.intro: Some third-party services we use may set their own cookies:
items: Payment providers: Stripe, PayU, Bold Checkout may use cookies to process payments
Monitoring services: Datadog and New Relic use cookies for performance analytics
Hosting services: Our hosting providers may use technical cookies

management.title: 4. Cookie Management
management.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your device and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed. However, if you do this, you may have to manually adjust some preferences each time you visit a site and some services and features may not work.
management.moreInfo: For more information on how to manage cookies in different browsers, see your browser documentation:

changes.title: 6. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We may update this cookie policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons. We recommend reviewing this page periodically.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about our cookie policy, you can contact us through our support system or Discord.

featuresPage.title: Features
featuresPage.subtitle: Discover everything SkollForge CMS can do for your project

banners.title: Banner Customization System
banners.description: Customize your banners with an intuitive and powerful interface. Add text, images and links to create attractive banners fully tailored to your needs. From the control panel you can create up to 10 different banners.

admin.title: Complete Administration Panel
admin.description: Intuitive and powerful interface to manage all aspects of your project from a single place. Customizable dashboard, real-time metrics and advanced management tools.

payments.title: Payment Gateway Integration
payments.description: Process payments and donations securely and automatically with Stripe and PayU. Easy setup, support for multiple currencies and complete transaction management.

emails.title: Transactional Email System
emails.description: Security system that sends validation emails to ensure only real users can register. Advanced filter that prevents bots and protects against fraudulent registrations through email verification. Customizable templates and delivery analytics.

monitoring.title: Advanced Monitoring and Alerts
monitoring.description: Our team is constantly monitoring your system, detecting errors and solving them proactively. Integration with Datadog and New Relic for complete observability.

vip.title: VIP System
vip.description: VIP membership system that allows your project to be self-sustaining. Users can acquire exclusive benefits, improving their experience while you generate recurring revenue to maintain and improve your server.

security.title: DDOS Protection and Firewall
security.description: Enterprise-level security to protect your project against threats and attacks. DDOS protection, configurable firewall and intrusion detection.

multi-realms.title: Multi-Realm System
multi-realms.description: Users can create accounts in different available realms from a single system. Manage multiple realms from a centralized control panel, allowing each user to have access to different realms according to their preferences.

multi-languages.title: Multi-Language System
multi-languages.description: Full support for multiple languages on your website. Users can change the language according to their preference and manage content in different languages from the administration panel.

store.title: Integrated Store
store.description: Complete store system to sell items, services and virtual products. Inventory management, shopping cart, transaction history and more.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs
